DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study evaluate 4000 subject acute coronary syndrome compare pravastatin 40 mg atorvastatin 80 mg determine clinically equivalent , evaluate effectiveness gatifloxacin therapy reduce cardiovascular event combination statin therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Pravastatin Atorvastatin Evaluation Infection Therapy ( TIMI22 )
DOC.criteria: Hospitalization MI high risk unstable angina within last 10 day . Total cholesterol 240 mg/dl great . Stabilized post ACS Comorbidity life expectation 2 year . Current lipid lowering therapy Corrected QT interval Need Class IA III antiarrhythmic agent
